page.title: 08EDUCATION Essex/Cambs Border
page.content: All children attend school. Local authorities provide transport to nearest state school in County. Chrishall Grange _ Fowlmere Primary School - Melbourn College. Ickleton Grange - Duxford County Primary School - Sawston Village College. Chrishall - Chrishall Primary School - Saffron Walden County High School. Most children living outside village boundaries go to Private Schools in Cambridge. All children living in Crawley End attend Chrishall Primary Sshool. All children between 2 and 5 years go to Playgroup in Chrishall. Few adults continue their education at local Village Colleges or in Cambridge.
